result.name: statement-of-fitness-for-work-form-med-3-evaluation-data
result.notes: Data collected from 58,695 fit notes issued to 25,000 patients between Oct 2011 and Jan 2013 in England, Scotland and Wales. Aim: quantitative assessment of the fit note to strengthen the evidence base on sickness certification and sickness absence. (Anonymised.)

organization.name: department-for-work-and-pensions
organization.title: Department for Work and Pensions
organization.description:
The Department for Work and Pensions (DWP) is responsible for welfare and pension policy and is a key player in tackling child poverty. It is the biggest public service delivery department in the UK and serves over 20 million customers.

DWP is a ministerial department, supported by 13 agencies and public bodies.

https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/department-for-work-pensions

result.title: Statement of Fitness for work form (Med 3) evaluation data

extras.value: https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/department-for-work-pensions/series/fit-note     Not due to be released. Contains personal data. Will be reviewed in the light of demand and prioritisation.
